title: Kristin Starts A Tradition In Honor Of Her Dad
description:
HR Consultant and Leadership Keynote Speaker Rita Barreto Craig once said “Traditions touch us, they connect us, and they expand us.”
Thursday is the anniversary of Kristin’s dads passing, and in honor of him Kristin would like to start a new tradition on the Bert Show.
The Bert Show listeners called in to share memorable moments of the loved ones they lost; moments that really make them smile when they think of it.
Kristin even shared an audio recording of her dad sharing his experience while in Vietnam.
